name: Requiem (itch) (Guilherme Gava)
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Requiem - a soul's last chance to undo its past mistakes. Break the time, and then rewind to correct your past mistakes.

Don't let any regrets (Time rifts) behind to be able to the next level.

Controls:

[Xbox controller as reference]

(Arrow keys) or (Left Stick): Move

(Z) or (A button): Jump

(X) or (X button): Dash

(R) or (Y button): Rewind

(BACKSPACE) or (SELECT button): Reset the level in case of any bugs.

Thank you!  <3
